ValidationRule.description: Ensures that refund cases have a refund request
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(ISPICKVAL(Department__c, "Refunds"), ISBLANK( Refund_Request__c ), ISPICKVAL( Status , "Closed"), NOT($User.LastName = 'SAS Automation Process'))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please create a refund request in order to close the refund case
